#!/bin/bash
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
rm -rf *
echo -e "Install requirement..."
apt update
apt install -y curl
echo -e "Download modpack installer..."
curl -o ./server_${MODPACK_ID}_${MODPACK_VERSION} "https://api.modpacks.ch/public/modpack/${MODPACK_ID}/${MODPACK_VERSION}/server/linux"
echo -e "Set installer permissions..."
chmod +x ./server_${MODPACK_ID}_${MODPACK_VERSION}
echo -e "Run installer..."
./server_${MODPACK_ID}_${MODPACK_VERSION} --nojava --auto
echo -e "Rename Files..."
function  unix_args {
  echo -e "Detected Forge 1.17 or newer version. Setting up forge unix args."
  ln -sf libraries/net/minecraftforge/forge/*/unix_args.txt unix_args.txt
}
if [[ ${MC_VERSION} -gt 16 ]]
then
   echo -e ""
   find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'forge*' -exec java -jar {} --installServer \;
   unix_args
   find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'forge*' -exec rm {} \;
   rm run.bat run.sh start.sh

else
   find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'forge*' -exec mv {} ./server.jar \;
fi
echo -e "Remove installer..."
rm ./server_${MODPACK_ID}_${MODPACK_VERSION}

echo -e "Installation complete!"
